name: GRAN TURISMO BUT RIPOFF
description:
i have played some racing game way back eg #Gran Turismo , #need for speed #NFS etc.so making a game on the list i mentioned was samething i loved .......so enjoy it or maybe get annoyed .

W ,S  move up and down

A,D move right and left

NB- if the car is stuck on the ground press 5 for boost, i dont know whats the problem but thats the solution i had and dont forget to subscribe on my YouTube channel

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC99DglRgS6GURdZBLYe8gdg
